column118: Quality / Environmental Manager to Müller Gas Equipment A/S
column119: Müller Gas Equipment A/S, Sønderborg We are looking for a new colleague to take care of our quality and environmental matters for our quality department in Sønderborg. We need someone with experience in the quality and environmental field and we will, of course, provide support with input regarding the tasks.  Tasks for the position as a Quality / Environmental Manager  Tasks relevant to quality matters:  Maintenance and further development of our quality manual Development of new (quality-relevant) documents in collaboration with the Technical Manager Handling of complaints in our ERP system Axapta (Microsoft Dynamics) Handling of external audits at Müller Gas Equipment A/S Handling and implementation of internal audits Initiation of change orders in our ERP system Forwarding quality-relevant documents to the management, including support regarding quality issues Tasks relevant to environmental matters: Registration of auxiliary materials used in production Checking and revising chemical tables used at Müller Gas Equipment A/S Preparation of documents regarding REACH, RoHs, work instructions, etc. Supporting the management in environmentally relevant matters  Contact with local environmental authorities Profile: Several years of relevant professional experience in the field of quality management Sound knowledge of ISO 9001 and ideally ISO 14001 Experience in preparing and accompanying external certification audits Further training as an (internal) auditor or willingness to acquire such training A high level of resilience and an independent, analytical and structured way of working A professional appearance, assertiveness and strong communication skills You are good at communicating in writing and speaking Danish, English and preferably also German Preferably knowledge of ERP system Axapta (Microsoft Dynamics) or similar system (SAP etc.) + MS Office 365 Date of employment: 01 March 2025 or by agreement. We look forward to receiving your written application as soon as possible by e-mail: info@bmv.dk with the subject line "Quality Manager" Further information about the company and a presentation video can be found on our website: https://bmv.dk/ If you have any questions, please contact our Technical Manager Daniel Ibald at (+45) 40 55 07 12. Müller Gas Equipment A/S is an order and series production company whose main production is gas valves / regulators for gas cylinders, natural gas, and medical and technical gases. The company currently employs approximately 145 employees.
